short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allows to contextify a piece of news found on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to analyze news articles and determine if it contains false claims. it uses Cohere API for the AI features. Used for the Cohere Thanksgiving AI Transformers Hackathon.
